attributes.action: Take military action in Rhodesia / Zimbabwe to remove Robert Mugabe and establish a Democratic Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long, the people of Rhodesia / Zimbabwe have suffered at the hands of autocratic terrorist Robert Mugabe who was installed under the watch of the British Government. We have watched the once glorious African nation decline to disasterous levels. We petition the Prime Minister to remove Robert Mugabe from his post and establish a Democratic Government under the watch of the UK as an Overseas Territory. We can get this nation back on its feet once more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
